keyword: how many calories are in cinema popcorn
title: How Many Calories Are in Cinema Popcorn?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in cinema popcorn for a typical medium serving, plus carbs, fat, protein, sodium details, and preparation tweaks to adjust intake.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Cinema Popcorn?
assumptions: Medium serving (approx. 100g or 11 cups), popped in oil with butter topping and salt; typical movie theater style.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by theater chain, serving size, butter amount, and toppings. Check venue nutrition info when available.

quick_answer.text: A medium serving of cinema popcorn contains about 550 calories, high in fat and sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a small cinema popcorn?
faqs.a: About 300-400 kcal for a small serving, depending on butter.

faqs.q: Is cinema popcorn high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 37g fat per medium serving, mostly from oil and butter.

faqs.q: How much sodium in cinema popcorn?
faqs.a: Typically 900mg or more per medium serving due to added salt.

faqs.q: What's the carb count in cinema popcorn?
faqs.a: About 48g carbs per medium serving, with 9g fiber.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in cinema popcorn?
faqs.a: Opt for no butter or plain; this can cut calories by 200-350 per serving.
